items.title: Codes of Ethics and Professional Conduct
Reflective Activity 2 - Inappropriate Use of Surveys

frontmatter.title: Research Methods and Professional Practice
frontmatter.excerpt: This e-portfolio provides a comprehensive documentation of the work and learning outcomes throughout the Research Methods and Professional Practice module at the University of Essex in November 2023. It encompasses a diverse array of activities, including collaborative discussions. The journey is culminated with a reflective piece, encapsulating the holistic learning experience within this module.
